translations.translation: They say: "Then this returning will be a dead loss."
They say: “That will then be a return with a great loss!”
They have said, "Such a resurrection will certainly be a great loss".
They said, “So this return is an obvious loss!”
They say: "It would in that case, be a return with loss!"
They said: That then would be a return occasioning loss.
They shall say, 'That then were a losing return!'
They say: Then that would be a vain proceeding.
and they say, "That indeed would be a losing return."
They say: that then shall be a losing return.
They will say, ‘This is, then, a ruinous return!’
They say: "It would, in that case, be a return with loss!"
They say: "It would in that case, be a return with loss!"
They will say: 'Then we are returned lost'
They say, “This is a losing proposition.”
They say, "That, then, would be a losing return."
[79:12] They will say, ‘That, return of ours to life, then, if it were true, would be a ruinous return!’.
The Prophet (pbuh) said to them: "Indeed, Allah will raise you again from the dead". (They say: Then that would be a vain proceeding) that would be a failed attempt, because it will never happen.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وبعدما استبعدوا واستكبروا بما استنكروا { قَالُواْ } منهمكين ومستهزئين: { تِلْكَ } الحالة المفروضة لو وقعت، ورددنا إلى الحياة بعد الموت، كما زعم هؤلاء المدَّعون؛ يعنون: الرسل، يحصل لنا { إِذاً كَرَّةٌ } عودة ورجعة { خَاسِرَةٌ } [النازعات: 12] ذا خسران وخذلان؛ لأننا كنا نكذِّب بها، ولا نصدِّق من أخبر بها، وبعدما وقعت كنَّا خاسرين خسراناً عظيماً
